snippet: Matt Cain took a shutout into the sixth inning and won for the first time since July 15.
abstract: MLB Roundup; San Francisco Giants defeat Colorado Rockies, 9-3; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Matt Cain took a shutout into the sixth inning and won for the first time since July 15.

headline.seo: Posey’s Homer Leads Giants Over Rockies
headline.main: Posey and Cain Help Giants Take Over First Place
